exercise.title: Key Codes
exercise.p: Make a program that randomizes hundred 4-digit key codes (numbers between 0-9999). Show them so that ten is shown on each row and every code is shown with four digits, e.g. 9 is shown as 0009.

ul.li: You can use the % operator to end rows
You can randomize the code with var codeNumber = Math.round((Math.random() * 9999) + 1);
With the toString() method you can convert a number to a string.
The length property of the text string object tells how long is the string.

exercise.p: Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
